summary: This document is a Truth-in-Savings Rate Information Disclosure Addendum from Deutsche Bank regarding a Money Market Deposit Account held by the Butterfly Trust. It provides details about the interest rate and annual percentage yield for the account.
locations: 8100 Red Hook Quarter, B3, St. Thomas 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document is a financial disclosure related to a Money Market Deposit Account.
The interest rate on the account is .20% with an annual percentage yield of .20%.
The document serves as an addendum to previously provided Terms and Conditions for deposit accounts.
